title: ORION Edge Health
description: Health and heartbeat messages from orion-edge devices. Critical for Dead Man's Switch safety monitoring.

health_id.description: Unique identifier for this health message

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when health check was performed

source.description: ORION edge module that emitted this health check (e.g., orion-edge-hexapod-1)

state.description: Current operational state of the edge device

uptime_seconds.description: Device uptime in seconds since last boot

last_command_id.description: UUID of the last command executed (optional, may be null if no commands received)

connection_status.description: Status of connections to core infrastructure

mqtt_connected.description: Whether MQTT broker connection is active

last_brain_contact.description: Timestamp of last successful communication with orion-brain

safety_state.description: Safety system status for Dead Man's Switch monitoring

dead_man_switch_active.description: Whether Dead Man's Switch is currently active (true = safety engaged)

watchdog_remaining_ms.description: Milliseconds remaining before watchdog triggers safety mode

in_safe_position.description: Whether device is in safe 'Sit & Freeze' position

errors.description: List of current error conditions (empty array if no errors)
